backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short descriptions summarizing each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with tab-based navigation between the five calculator modules.
frontend/src/components/actions/ClearSav: Button with confirmation dialog that clears all saved localStorage data and reloads the page.
frontend/src/components/branding/AppLogo: Logo component displaying the CryptoWise image asset.
frontend/src/components/coins/CoinSearch: Searchable CoinGecko-powered coin selector with popover UI.
frontend/src/components/forms/DCAEntryRo: Row component for DCA entries with buy price and amount inputs and optional remove button.
App layout with header, background, main content wrapper, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/GlassCard: Reusable glass-style card wrapper using Tailwind and shadcn card component.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareTrade: Exports a button that captures a referenced DOM element into a canvas and downloads it as an image, showing a loading state during export.
frontend/src/components/share/TradePlanC: Defines a styled card component for displaying trade plan data with a title, coin info, and labeled value rows.
frontend/src/components/visual/RiskRewar: Renders a visual badge and bar indicators showing risk and reward widths based on a risk‑reward ratio.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinGecko.ts: Provides React Query hooks for searching coins and fetching price and market data from CoinGecko.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing authentication state using DFINITY AuthClient.
Custom hook syncing state to localStorage with automatic load, save, and reset.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining CSS variables and applying global typography and theme styles.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/dca.ts: Calculates total invested, total tokens, and average entry price for DCA entries.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/futureValue: Computes future value and total contributions based on initial amount, monthly contributions, and interest rate.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/moonMath.ts: Computes implied price and multiple by comparing supply and target market cap for two coins.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/pnl.ts: Calculates token quantity, net profit, and ROI after buy/sell fees for a trade.
frontend/src/lib/calculators/risk.ts: Computes position size, risk metrics, and optional risk‑reward ratio based on entry, stop, capital, and targets.
frontend/src/lib/format.ts: Utility functions for formatting numbers as USD, percentages, tokens, and general numeric formats.
frontend/src/lib/storageKeys.ts: Defines localStorage keys for calculator states and provides a helper to clear them all.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge Tailwind and class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/modules/DCAModule.tsx: Provides an interactive DCA calculator with dynamic entry rows, local storage state, computed totals, and shareable plan output.
frontend/src/pages/modules/FutureValueMo: Implements a compound‑interest future value calculator with user inputs, persisted state, computed projections, and shareable output.
frontend/src/pages/modules/MoonMathModul: Fetches market data for two coins and calculates implied price targets based on relative market caps, with selection UI and validation.
frontend/src/pages/modules/PnLModule.tsx: Calculates profit/loss with fees, optional live price integration, coin selection, and summarizes trade metrics.
frontend/src/pages/modules/RiskModule.ts: Computes position sizing and risk metrics from entry, stop loss, and capital inputs, with validation and optional target price.
frontend/src/services/coingecko.ts: Wraps CoinGecko API calls for searching coins, fetching prices, and retrieving market data with basic error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, layouts, and animations with added plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the CryptoWise Strategy Hub, its architecture plans, required images, and current feature list with versions.
